description: Compute chance of seeing satellite trails in HST images
instructions:
Calculate the chance of seeing a satellite trail in the HST images by normalizing with the exposure time and scaling the FoV of ACS/WFC and WFC3/UVIS for the time periods 2009-2020 vs 2021. 
 Return the results in a tuple (chance_ACS_WFC_pre2020, chance_WFC3_UVIS_pre2020, chance_ACS_WFC_post2021, chance_WFC3_UVIS_post2021).
